data.lyric:
[ti:Build a Bitch (Explicit)]
[ar:Bella Poarch]
[al:Build a Bitch (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]Build a Bitch (Explicit) - Bella Poarch
[00:00.19]Lyrics by：Salem Ilese/Justin Gamella/David Arkwright/Sub Urban/Elie Rizk/Bella Poarch
[00:01.01]This ain't Build-A-b***h
[00:02.74]A b***h
[00:03.08]You don't get to pick and choose
[00:05.49]Different a*s and bigger boobs
[00:07.62]If my eyes are brown or blue
[00:09.74]
[00:10.31]This ain't Build-A-b***h
[00:11.47]A b***h
[00:11.96]I'm filled with flaws and attitude
[00:14.62]So if you need perfect I'm not built for you
[00:18.15]
[00:19.66]Yeah
[00:20.18]Bob the Builder broke my heart
[00:22.28]Told me I need fixing
[00:24.69]Said that I'm just nuts and bolts
[00:26.88]Lotta parts were missing
[00:28.80]
[00:29.33]Curvy like a cursive font
[00:31.59]Virgin and a vixen
[00:34.03]That's the kind of girl he wants
[00:35.99]
[00:36.62]But he forgot
[00:38.06]This ain't Build-A-b***h
[00:39.62]A b***h
[00:40.36]You don't get to pick and choose
[00:42.75]Different a*s and bigger boobs
[00:45.05]If my eyes are brown or blue
[00:47.34]This ain't Build-A-b***h
[00:48.78]A b***h
[00:49.14]I'm filled with flaws and attitude
[00:52.08]So if you need perfect I'm not built for you
[00:55.13]One two three ooh
[00:57.90]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la
[01:01.37]
[01:02.54]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la
[01:06.05]
[01:06.64]Boys are always playing dolls
[01:08.96]Looking for their Barbie
[01:11.32]They don't look like Ken at all
[01:13.56]Hardly have a heartbeat
[01:15.92]Need someone who falls apart
[01:18.18]So he can play Prince Charming
[01:20.01]
[01:20.55]If that's the kind of girl he wants
[01:22.53]
[01:23.16]Then he forgot
[01:24.39]
[01:24.91]This ain't Build-A-b***h
[01:26.11]A b***h
[01:26.94]You don't get to pick and choose
[01:29.25]Different a*s and bigger boobs
[01:31.57]If my eyes are brown or blue
[01:33.99]This ain't Build-A-b***h
[01:35.53]A b***h
[01:36.23]I'm filled with flaws and attitude
[01:38.37]So if you need perfect I'm not built for you
[01:41.74]One two three
[01:44.48]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la
[01:47.99]
[01:49.13]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la-la
[01:52.57]La-la-la-la-la-la-la-la la-la-la-la-la-la-la
data.trans:
[ti:Build a Bitch (Explicit)]
[ar:Bella Poarch]
[al:Build a Bitch (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.19]//
[00:01.01]我并非为你量身打造的洋娃娃
[00:02.74]完美的洋娃娃
[00:03.08]你没有选择的权利
[00:05.49]与众不同 凹凸有致的身材
[00:07.62]如果我的眼睛是棕色或者蓝色
[00:09.74]
[00:10.31]我并非为你量身打造的洋娃娃
[00:11.47]完美的洋娃娃
[00:11.96]我浑身缺点 态度鲜明
[00:14.62]所以 如果你需要完美的女孩 我并非为你而生
[00:18.15]
[00:19.66]//
[00:20.18]像工程师一样伤透我的心
[00:22.28]告诉我需要好好修理一番
[00:24.69]说我只是不起眼的一堆零件
[00:26.88]许多部分已经缺失
[00:28.80]
[00:29.33]婀娜的身姿犹如草书一般流畅
[00:31.59]不谙世事的少女和性格乖戾的泼妇
[00:34.03]这是他梦寐以求的女孩
[00:35.99]
[00:36.62]但是他已经忘记
[00:38.06]我并非为你量身打造的洋娃娃
[00:39.62]完美的洋娃娃
[00:40.36]你没有选择的权利
[00:42.75]与众不同 凹凸有致的身材
[00:45.05]如果我的眼睛是棕色或者蓝色
[00:47.34]我并非为你量身打造的洋娃娃
[00:48.78]完美的洋娃娃
[00:49.14]我浑身缺点 态度鲜明
[00:52.08]所以 如果你需要完美的女孩 我并非为你而生
[00:55.13]一 二 三
[00:57.90]//
[01:01.37]
[01:02.54]//
[01:06.05]
[01:06.64]男孩们总是摆弄着玩偶
[01:08.96]寻找属于他们的芭比娃娃
[01:11.32]但是他们看起来一点也不像Ken
[01:13.56]几乎没有心跳
[01:15.92]需要一个心灰意冷的女孩
[01:18.18]这样他可以扮演白马王子
[01:20.01]
[01:20.55]如果这就是他梦寐以求的女孩
[01:22.53]
[01:23.16]然后他忘得一干二净
[01:24.39]
[01:24.91]我并非为你量身打造的洋娃娃
[01:26.11]完美的洋娃娃
[01:26.94]你没有选择的权利
[01:29.25]与众不同 凹凸有致的身材
[01:31.57]如果我的眼睛是棕色或者蓝色
[01:33.99]我并非为你量身打造的洋娃娃
[01:35.53]完美的洋娃娃
[01:36.23]我浑身缺点 态度鲜明
[01:38.37]所以 如果你需要完美的女孩 我并非为你而生
[01:41.74]一 二 三
[01:44.48]//
[01:47.99]
[01:49.13]//
[01:52.57]//
